Asset.Description: A higher-res, old-school style UI theme GeonBit.UI comes with by default.
Asset.Credits:
This theme is mostly based on Michele Bucelli ("Buch") works. Sources can be found here:
- http://opengameart.org/content/golden-ui - http://opengameart.org/content/roguelikerpg-icons - http://opengameart.org/content/roguelikerpg-items - http://opengameart.org/content/arabian-icons - http://opengameart.org/content/2d-static-spritesicons - http://opengameart.org/content/30-ability-icons - http://opengameart.org/content/whispers-of-avalon-item-icons
